Question.Subject: i added a visitor counter to my ebay listing, and it tells me there is one, but i cannot see it! help please?
Question.Content: i selected the option, but i cannot see a counter anywhere.... maybe im looking in the wrong place? croc's suggestion did not work, unfortunately =( thank you though any other ideas??
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Try clearing your cache/temporary internet files and cookies and log back into eBay.
Edit: Try eBay's answer center. I think your question should probably be posted under 'Technical Issues'.
http://pages.ebay.com/community/answercenter/index.html?ssPageName=comm:f:f:US

Answer.Content:
